mapper.insert: insert into supplier (supplier_name, supplier_unit, supplier_no, supplier_spell, supplier_type, supplier_brand, supplier_location, supplier_telphone) values (#{supplierName}, #{supplierUnit}, #{supplierNo}, #{supplierSpell}, #{supplierType}, #{supplierBrand}, #{supplierLocation}, #{supplierTelphone})
mapper.update: update supplier set supplier_name=#{supplierName}, supplier_unit=#{supplierUnit}, supplier_spell=#{supplierSpell}, supplier_type=#{supplierType}, supplier_brand=#{supplierBrand}, supplier_location=#{supplierLocation}, supplier_telphone=#{supplierTelphone} where supplier_id = #{supplierId}
mapper.select: select * from supplier order by supplier_id
